amendment.description: To provide reconciliation instructions to reduce the deficit by $63,860,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2014 through 2023.

vote.text: Amendment SA 152 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 78.

action.text: Amendment SA 152 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman.
